description:
gc: Use %#F in error messages instead of %F.

Fixes issue 2520

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On Tue, Dec 13, 2011 at 12:51,  <lvd@google.com> wrote:
> On 2011/12/13 09:21:54, lvd wrote:
>>
>> Hello mailto:rsc@golang.org (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
>
>> I'd like you to review this change to
>> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> hold on, this appears to break exp/types/gcimporter again.
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5482056/

should all work now.

On 2011/12/13 09:21:54, lvd wrote:
> Hello mailto:rsc@golang.org (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

hold on, this appears to break exp/types/gcimporter again.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e25954278b04 ***

gc: Use %#F in error messages instead of %F.

Fixes issue 2520

subject: code review 5482056: gc: Use %#F in error messages instead of %F.
